Original: Oh, gracious explorers... You took
my request! We need your help!
[Page]
My son Raht heard about the discovery
of the [Color:5]Scarlet Pillars[Color:0] and rushed off
to see it for himself.
[Page]
But yesterday... we got a terrifying
letter via carrier pigeon...
Translation: Oh, gracious explorers... You took
my request! We need your help!
[Page]
My son Raht heard about the discovery
of the [Color:5]Scarlet Pillars[Color:0] and rushed off
to see it for himself.
[Page]
But yesterday... we got a terrifying
letter via carrier pigeon...

Original: "Dear Mother,
How are you? I miss the good old days,
from before I sprained my ankle.
[Page]
"When I got to the Scarlet Pillars, I
went forward four paces. To the left,
I saw a pillar of light.
[Page]
"Naturally, I was curious, so I turned
and went 2 more paces. That's when a
monster blindsided me from the left.
[Page]
"So I turned right, went 5 paces,
turned right again and then went
4 more. But there was another beast!
[Page]
"So I turned my ship right and flew
4 paces that way, then turned all
the way around to face the monster.
[Page]
"Glaring at it, I retreated 3 paces,
and... After that, I can't remember
precisely what happened.
[Page]
"All I can be sure of is that I am
now a tragically lost soul who has
crashed and sprained his ankle."
Translation: "Dear Mother,
How are you? I miss the good old days,
from before I sprained my ankle.
[Page]
"When I got to the Scarlet Pillars, I
went forward four paces. To the left,
I saw a pillar of light.
[Page]
"Naturally, I was curious, so I turned
and went 2 more paces. That's when a
monster blindsided me from the left.
[Page]
"So I turned right, went 5 paces,
turned right again and then went
4 more. But there was another beast!
[Page]
"So I turned my ship right and flew
4 paces that way, then turned all
the way around to face the monster.
[Page]
"Glaring at it, I retreated 3 paces,
and... After that, I can't remember
precisely what happened.
[Page]
"All I can be sure of is that I am
now a tragically lost soul who has
crashed and sprained his ankle."

Original: Good explorers... Please find my poor
son and tell me where he is!
[Page]
Once I have his location, I can tell
the rescue team where to look. I beg
of you...
Translation: Good explorers... Please find my poor
son and tell me where he is!
[Page]
Once I have his location, I can tell
the rescue team where to look. I beg
of you...

Original: Oh, Raht... When I think of the danger
he could be in now... Curse whoever
discovered the Scarlet Pillars!
Translation: Oh, Raht... When I think of the danger
he could be in now... Curse whoever

Original: My son's letter is the only clue we
have. I'll read it again, so please
listen carefully.
Translation: My son's letter is the only clue we

Original: I feel so ashamed of my son...
Please find my boy!
Translation: I feel so ashamed of my son...
Please find my boy!

Original: I-Is that true!? Then please show me

Translation: I-Is that true!? Then please show me

Original: Oh, good! I'll tell the rescue team

Translation: Oh, good! I'll tell the rescue team

[Page]

where he really is. You're my only
hope...!
